edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin
Class Flashlight

java.lang.Object
  edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Flashlight

public class Flashlight
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the flashlight and the attributes and behaviors associated with flashlight that will be used in our game, SpyNin. The flashlight is a powerup available to the player in the game. The flashlight's purpose is to further reveal the section he is facing to identify incoming ninjas by lighting the section he is in. Only the player will be able to decide to whether or not to use the flashlight.

Constructor Summary
Flashlight()
          This is the constructor for the class Flashlight.
 
Method Summary
 void activateFlashlight(java.lang.String choiceFlashlight)
          This method will turn on or off the Flashlight during the course of the Game to assist the player in finding the Briefcase and avoiding or killing Ninja.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Flashlight

public Flashlight()
This is the constructor for the class Flashlight. Initially the Flashlight is set to off. This might change during the course of the Game depending on the player's choiceFlashlight of whether to use the Flashlight.

Method Detail

activateFlashlight

public void activateFlashlight(java.lang.String choiceFlashlight)
This method will turn on or off the Flashlight during the course of the Game to assist the player in finding the Briefcase and avoiding or killing Ninja.

Parameters:
choiceFlashlight - the player's decision of whether or not to activate the flashlight
